title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue is caused by the fact that setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations, creating an illegal state when the first operation is set.
EB: Bug 4974: The setting of classpath / output location should be offered as one operation, similar to the validation process that checks both classpath and output location at once. Additionally, the error message displayed should be revised to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
